LEVANTE MAKE PEREZ OFFER

Levante have made a loan offer for Arsenal forward Lucas Perez, reports Marca.

The LaLiga side want a striker to bolster their attack and they have set their sights on Perez.

Levante are willing to pay Arsenal a €1.5m loan fee and cover the forward’s €3m salary and the Gunners are open to the proposal, even though they would prefer to sell him outright for €15m.

The player himself, meanwhile, wants to rejoin his old club Deportivo La Coruna. The Spaniard has been offered to Newcastle United, Roma and Valencia.

Levante are willing to pay Arsenal a €1.5m loan fee and cover the forward’s €3m salary and the Gunners are open to the proposal, even though they would prefer to sell him outright for €15m.

The player himself, meanwhile, wants to rejoin his old club Deportivo La Coruna. The Spaniard has been offered to Newcastle United, Roma and Valencia.

BBC Sport chief football writer
Liverpool have a serious interest in completing a deal for Arsenal's Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain before Thursday's transfer deadline. He is a player manager Jurgen Klopp rates very highly and is keen to bring to Anfield.

As yet, however, there has been no bid from Liverpool for the England international - but the situation is being monitored and is almost certain to change after his refusal to join Chelsea.

邊個贏高安基就撐邊個

加齊迪斯比雲加既新約傳聞係
1.要雲加同意加設體育總監處理所有轉會

3.要雲加同意將舊有部分加齊迪斯認為唔達標既教練全部換過佢，而新既教練全數由加齊迪斯全權負責換返黎

雲加一開始唔同意，決定唔動筆簽約

最後雙方讓步
頭2點延後實施
第3點請人同換人要經雲加同意，但同時加齊迪斯換返黎個幾個新職員要安插係教練團隊

係呀！但呢條新合約D條款都係雲加贏
